edge: Pritam composed the soundtrack for Brahmāstra: Part One – Shiva.
The lyrics for the songs in Brahmāstra: Part One – Shiva were written by Amitabh Bhattacharya.
Singer Tushar Joshi lent his voice to the song 'Rasiya' in Brahmāstra: Part One – Shiva.
The songs in Brahmāstra: Part One – Shiva were produced and mixed by British musician Steel Banglez.

node_2: pritam, prasad shaste, jim satya, meghdeep bose, tanuj tiku & ketan sodha
edge: Pritam composed the background score of Brahmāstra: Part One – Shiva in collaboration with Prasad Shaste, Jim Satya, Meghdeep Bose, Tanuj Tiku & Ketan Sodha.
The score for Brahmāstra: Part One – Shiva was recorded at Synchron Stage Vienna.
